column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our free bread came out burnt. Told our server
column3: he informed us that the bread was suppose to be crusty and burnt like that. Took our discarded burnt bread pieces and didn't return with a new bread until the bus boy asked us. Guess what? The new bread wasn't burnt and actually good. I understand it was busy
column4: but you don't have to make excuses. Just look at the food and make a judgement call.
